MacroOp.Name: OMNI_CLOCK_TICK_T
MacroOp.Brief: Defines the underlying clock tick type.
MacroOp.Description: Depending on platform being built against, this macro will expand to the proper clock tick type needed by the platforms implementation.
MacroOp.PlatformSpecific: This value will be different based on platform being targeted.
MacroOp.Synopsis: This macro option is defined based on the platform being built against. For more information on it, see @h omni/chrono/tick.hpp @h and @h omni/types/tick_t.hpp @h
